section.title: Introduction
section.para: Welcome to the PhotoPulse software user's guide. This guide fully explains the PhotoPulse software to enable you to use the program to its fullest potential.

This guide documents PhotoPulse version .
The latest version of this guide is always available online at the PhotoPulse website.

PhotoPulse provides a fast and easy way for you to combine your digital photo and music files into an exciting motion filled presentation. In just a couple of minutes you can convert a folder full of photos into a fun show with sophisticated transitions and effects. This show can easily be shared with friends and family via the Internet or CDROM.
